products.name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
products.description: Transform your skin with our potent Vitamin C serum. Reduces dark spots, evens skin tone, and boosts radiance. Lightweight formula absorbs quickly without sticky residue.

products.name: Hydrating Face Moisturizer
products.description: Deeply hydrate and nourish your skin with this rich moisturizer. Contains hyaluronic acid and ceramides for all-day hydration. Suitable for all skin types.

products.name: Rose Hip Oil
products.description: Pure, cold-pressed Rose Hip Oil rich in vitamins A and C. Perfect for reducing scars, aging signs, and uneven skin tone. Works on face and body.

products.name: Charcoal Face Mask
products.description: Deep cleansing charcoal mask that removes impurities and unclogs pores. Leave on for 10-15 minutes for glowing, clear skin. Great for oily and acne-prone skin.

products.name: Retinol Night Cream
products.description: Advanced retinol formula that reduces wrinkles and fine lines while you sleep. Promotes skin renewal and boosts collagen. Use at night for best results.

products.name: Sunscreen SPF 50
products.description: Broad-spectrum protection with SPF 50. Lightweight, non-greasy formula. Provides UVA and UVB protection. Perfect for daily use.
